728802f-b.text:
(1)
Douglas Road, west side, about 100 yards aouth of its junction with Richmond Road, showing the old Judge Emerson Mansion.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Another view from a different angle.
May 14, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
728802f-b.folder: Douglas Road & Richmond Road, Staten Island, NY
